item.title: Reading_list
item.description: Reading List on MongoDB 1.https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/76927835 一文学会matplotlib绘图 2.https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/30029333 3.https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/35816296 4.http://sofasofa.io/forum_main_post.php?postid=1004614 5.https://www.jianshu.com/p/0f8465f094e8 6.https://blog.csdn.net/dongcheng_/article/details/82901191 7.https://blog.csdn.net/gmr2453929471/article/details/78655834 8.https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/44029268 Pandas数据清洗-排序-索引-选取 9.https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/36205119 基于Python的描述性统计实践 10.https://juejin.im/post/5ad1d2836fb9a028dd4eaae6 正确理解和

item.title: Google Cloud Vision API
item.description: Obsolete Modules Error: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named ‘google.cloud’ pip install --upgrade google-cloud-speech Error: ImportError: cannot import name ‘vision’ from ‘google.cloud’ (unknown location) pip install --upgrade setuptools pip wheel pip install google-cloud-vision Re-Auth https://cloud.google.com/vision/docs/setup#auth Note that you may want to check your $PATH before you start.

item.title: Finance Figures Open APIs
item.description: cninfo API: http://webapi.cninfo.com.cn/#/myApi Basic info: http://webapi.cninfo.com.cn/api/sysapi/p_sysapi1018?scode=002055 method = post Income statment overview : http://webapi.cninfo.com.cn/api/stock/p_stock2332?scode=002055&sdate=20190930&edate=20190930&type=071001 method = post Cash flow : http://webapi.cninfo.com.cn/api/stock/p_stock2333?scode=002055&sdate=20190331&edate=20190331&type=071001 method = post Indicators : http://webapi.cninfo.com.cn/api/stock/p_stock2303?scode=002055&rdate=20190930&type=071001 method = post Wind visualization: https://wx.wind.com.cn/reactweb/YearReport/index.html?from=singlemessage#/report?windCode=002055.SZ&typeCode=0 Caixin Alarming news for listed company: https://entities.caixin.com/api/sentiment/list?busType=15&callback=_jsonpw0q7lraqur Statements of stocks: https://stock.caixin.com/cgi/stockFinanceHome?code=101002235 method = get, preview: https://stock.caixin.com/m/stock/details/101002235?type=finance // stockcode is not stock code.
